statements: SELECT * FROM risk_analysis WHERE policy_id = 100;
SELECT policy_id, risk_factor FROM risk_analysis WHERE market_trend = 'Bullish';
SELECT claim_pattern FROM risk_analysis WHERE policy_id = 200 ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT risk_factor FROM risk_analysis WHERE market_trend = 'Bearish' AND claim_pattern = 'High';
SELECT DISTINCT market_trend FROM risk_analysis WHERE policy_id IN (100, 200, 300);
SELECT * FROM risk_analysis WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT risk_factor, market_trend FROM risk_analysis WHERE policy_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM risk_analysis WHERE risk_factor = 'High' AND market_trend = 'Up';
SELECT policy_id, claim_pattern FROM risk_analysis WHERE market_trend = 'Down';
SELECT DISTINCT risk_factor FROM risk_analysis;
SELECT * FROM risk_factors;
SELECT id, name, type FROM risk_factors WHERE type='health';
SELECT name, value FROM risk_factors WHERE value > 0;
SELECT * FROM claim_patterns ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM claim_patterns GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM risk_factors WHERE type = 'Health' ORDER BY value DESC
SELECT name, type FROM risk_factors WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount FROM claim_patterns WHERE customer_id = 12345 ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT name, type, value FROM risk_factors WHERE type IN ('Health', 'Finance') ORDER BY value DESC, name ASC
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount FROM claim_patterns WHERE claim_amount >= 500 AND claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM RiskFactors
SELECT factor_name, factor_description FROM RiskFactors ORDER BY factor_id DESC
SELECT factor_name, factor_description FROM RiskFactors WHERE factor_name LIKE '%risk%'
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_id = 3
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY trend_name
SELECT * FROM RiskFactors WHERE factor_name = 'Market Volatility';
SELECT factor_id, factor_name FROM RiskFactors WHERE factor_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY factor_id DESC;
SELECT factor_id, factor_description FROM RiskFactors WHERE factor_description LIKE '%increased%' ORDER BY factor_id;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY trend_name ASC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_amount FROM ClaimPatterns WHERE claim_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM RiskFactors;
SELECT risk_factor_name, risk_factor_description FROM RiskFactors;
SELECT trend_name, trend_data FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM ClaimPatterns ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description, pricing_strategy->>'risk_level' AS risk_level FROM UnderwritingStrategies;
SELECT * FROM RiskFactors
SELECT trend_name, trend_data FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY trend_name DESC
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, policy_id FROM ClaimPatterns WHERE claim_amount > 500 ORDER BY claim_date ASC
SELECT * FROM UnderwritingStrategies WHERE strategy_id = 3
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM UnderwritingStrategies
SELECT * FROM insurance_claim ORDER BY claim_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT policy_type, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policy WHERE policy_type = 'Car Insurance';
SELECT factor_name FROM risk_factors WHERE factor_name LIKE '%health%';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM market_trends ORDER BY trend_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claim ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer;
SELECT policy_type, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policy WHERE policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT count(*) AS total_claims FROM insurance_claim;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, policy_type FROM customer INNER JOIN policy ON customer.customer_id = policy.policy_id;
